attributes.action: Conduct a second EU referendum before Article 50 is invoked.
attributes.additional_details:
As at this moment and until someone triggers Article 50 we are still in the EU and I believe there is a strong case for conducting a second referendum before the process of leaving is triggered.

If you are in favour of a second referendum before Article 50 is invoked then add your name to this petition.
attributes.background: I believe that the electorate were misled and misinformed during the campaign and that there is no longer a majority in favour of leaving the EU.
